acidity.notes: Deep and cool grape, bright orange, citrus, complex, mellow.

sweetness.notes: Vanilla undertone in fruit notes. Very smooth and creamy. Mouth does not want to pucker.

body.notes: Tea-like. It works but I don't have a strong preference.

finish.notes: Orange fades into tea notes. Sweetness lingers on tongue, then feels minty. Long finish.

flavor: Probably the 'easiest' cup to drink so far from this SO. The fruit note is very complex, with more focused flavors like cherry/grape/plum and brighter citrus tones. Sweetness really makes this cup â€” I don't feel the need to get water, and the finish settles smoothly and sugary like a cough drop or peppermint tea.
